The statistics are at 4 minutes in, near the end of the video.
 
 Free Videos Online - CenturyLink
 
 
in 2009, of the 294 terrorist attacks conducted in Europe only 1 was an Islamist attack.
 
 in 2010, of the 249 terrorist attacks conducted in Europe only 3 were Islamist attacks.
